name: Spider Solitaire: Kingdom
description:
A Classic solitaire card game featuring the same addictive gameplay with a more stylish presentation!

"Spider Solitaire: Kingdom" brings you the classic Solitaire feel with added pizazz!
Enjoy this solitaire game for FREE!

The game features:

• The classic Spider Solitaire experience
• Availability for both iPhone and iPad
• A Simple and clean layout
• Daily challenges

NOTES:

• This app contains banner and interstitial ads.
